title: 9TTMM - Wear watch face
summary: 9TTMM watch face app for Android Wear
description: 9TTMM is a designer watchface app for Android Wear devices. App has a nine colors customization and works in ambient mode. Minutes are divided in six groups of nine dots. Each dot represents a single minute. Every ten minutes the group  transforms itself into one square. After thirty minutes a long rectangle appears. 9TTMM is golden A' Design Award Winner in Interface and Interaction Design Category.Compatible with Huawei Watch, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3Idea & design : Albert SalamonAndroid programming : Michał Żyliński© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
descriptionHTML:
9TTMM is a designer watchface app for Android Wear devices. App has a nine colors customization and works in ambient mode. Minutes are divided in six groups of nine dots. Each dot represents a single minute. Every ten minutes the group transforms itself into one square. After thirty minutes a long rectangle appears. 9TTMM is golden A' Design Award Winner in Interface and Interaction Design Category.

Compatible with Huawei Watch, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3

Idea & design : Albert Salamon
Android programming : Michał Żyliński

© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
comments: A novel watch face, though lacking display elements like seconds and date. Those aren't necessarily important, so my only real gripe is how small it is on a round watch (or, perhaps, a higher-resolution one like my Huawei Watch.
Amazing simplistic design, by far my favourite. Would like the option to change to 12hr, without changing phone settings.
Awesome The beauty of this watch face is it's simplicity. It is my favorite so far.
More! This is how smartwatch faces should be.
